summary: The 'NO LIMITS Act of 2025' addresses the People's Republic of China's (PRC) support for Russia's invasion of Ukraine. It authorizes the President to impose sanctions on PRC entities involved in supporting Russia's military and those operating in the Russian technology and defense sectors. The bill also mandates a determination of sanctions for PRC arms manufacturers engaged in overseas weapons sales. It expands export controls to prevent diversion to Russia and requires relevant agencies to issue implementing regulations.
